biotools.summary:
Omics-Based Interaction Framework – a systems model to reveal molecular drivers of synergy.

OBIF Package in R includes the analytical components of the Omics-Based Interaction Framework. This framework and package are used to discover molecular drivers of non-additive phenotypes (synergistic or angatonistic responses) from single- or multi-Omics data.
